fields.name: year
fields.title: Fiscal Year Ending
fields.description: This fields shows the current fiscal reporting period’s ending (March 31, YYYY).

fields.name: mandate_description_en
fields.title: Description of departmental mandate (English)
fields.description: Provide a brief explanation, in English, of the department’s mandate, major programs and linkages with core laws or regulations to help readers understand the travel, hospitality and conference expenditures incurred by the department and how they support the department’s mandate, including significant structural or program changes.

fields.name: operational_activities_kdollars
fields.title: Travel ≥2018 – Operational activities ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for travel of public servants and non-public servants for the expenditure category – Operational activities for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: key_stakeholders_kdollars
fields.title: Travel ≥2018 – Key stakeholders ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for travel of public servants and non-public servants for the expenditure category – key stakeholders for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: training_kdollars
fields.title: Travel ≥2018 – Training ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for travel of public servants and non-public servants for the expenditure category – Training for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: other_kdollars
fields.title: Travel ≥2018 – Other ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for travel of public servants and non-public servants for the expenditure category – Other for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: internal_governance_kdollars
fields.title: Travel ≥2018 – Internal governance ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for travel of public servants and non-public servants for the expenditure category – Internal governance for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: non_public_servants_kdollars
fields.title: Travel <2018 – Non-Public Servants ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for travel of non-public servants for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: public_servants_kdollars
fields.title: Travel <2018 – Public Servants ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for travel of public servants for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: hospitality_kdollars
fields.title: Hospitality ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for hospitality for the previous reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY-1) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: conference_fees_kdollars
fields.title: Conference Fees ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for conference fees for the current reporting fiscal year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: minister_kdollars
fields.title: International Travel by Minister and Minister's Staff ($ thousands)
fields.description: This field shows annual expenditures for international travel by Minister and Minister’s staff for the current reporting year (Year Ending March 31, YYYY) in thousands of dollars

fields.name: travel_compared_fiscal_year_en
fields.title: Explanation of Significant Variance of the total travel expenditure (English)
fields.description: Provide a brief explanation, in English, of the significant reason(s) for the increase/decrease in annual expenditures for travel of public servants and non-public servants.

fields.name: hospitality_compared_fiscal_year_en
fields.title: Hospitality - Explanation of Significant Variance (English)
fields.description: Provide a brief explanation, in English, of the significant reason(s) for the increase/decrease in annual expenditures for hospitality.

fields.name: conference_fees_compared_fiscal_year_en
fields.title: Conference Fees - Explanation of Significant Variance (English)
fields.description: Provide a brief explanation, in English, of the significant reason(s) for the increase/decrease in annual expenditures for conference fees.

fields.name: minister_compared_fiscal_year_en
fields.title: International Travel by Minister and Minister’s Staff - Explanation of Significant Variance (English)
fields.description: Provide a brief explanation, in English, of the significant reason(s) for the increase/decrease in annual expenditures for international travel by the minister and minister's staff.
